name: telegram-audio-bot
description: Telegram Voice-to-Text bot on Cloudflare Workers AI

scripts.deploy: FILE_HASH=$(sha256sum src/index.ts | awk '{ print $1 }') && wrangler deploy --define DEPLOYED_HASH:"$FILE_HASH"
scripts.test-deploy: FILE_HASH=$(sha256sum src/index.ts | awk '{ print $1 }') && wrangler deploy --dry-run --outdir ./dist-check --define DEPLOYED_HASH:"$FILE_HASH"
